task_specific_rules: To pick a book you need to go to the books place.
To place a book you need to go to the mentioned place.
If the number of books are less use only one robot
if the task in on large number of books use two robots.
to clean  the shelf robot need to get the cleanign tools and then goto specified place and clean the shelf.
to get a book to a person, mostly robot need to find it in the shelf and then pick it up and go to the person and then give it to him.
